text: Yes, it tanked at the box office. But the movie is worth watching, if only as a curiosity. Columbia Pictures Few recent releases have flamed out quite so spectacularly as The Tourist, which opened stateside in December to tepid reviews and slower - than - expected business, and almost overnight became an object of ridicule. There have lately been money - losers of much greater magnitude ( this month's Mars Needs Moms, for instance ), but The Tourist's unique combination of flawless pedigree — Angelina Jolie, Johnny Depp, white - hot European director — and overall inertness made it an easy target.
